page.title: 03My Home in Kylesku
page.content: Unilke most people I live in a hotel all year round. My parents own Kylesku Hotel. The hotel started as a house for the ferryman in the early nineteenth century. Drovers bringing the black cattle from the North West crossed in the then ferry _ a rowing boat. Sometimes these drovers would spend a night with the ferryman and as the years passed the house became an inn. The majority of our guests spend a week with us, enjoying the beautiful scenery and the peace and quiet of the area. Many spend their time walking on the hills, fishing the many local lochs and sailing, while others go in their cars to deserted, sandy beaches. I enjoy living at the hotel, meeting lots of people, but I prefer the Winter months when the hotel becomes my home again.
